name: IsSimpleRing.matrix
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝³ : Ring A
inst✝² : Fintype ι
inst✝¹ : Nonempty ι
inst✝ : IsSimpleRing A
⊢ IsSimpleRing (Matrix ι ι A)
decl:
instance matrix [IsSimpleRing A] : IsSimpleRing (Matrix ι ι A) where
  simple := TwoSidedIdeal.orderIsoMatricesOver (Nonempty.some ‹_›) (Nonempty.some ‹_›)
    |>.symm.isSimpleOrder
